Package com.rubynaxela.kyanite.game.entities

Class Particle

java.lang.Object
org.jsfml.internal.SFMLNativeObject
com.rubynaxela.kyanite.core.SFMLNativeObject
org.jsfml.graphics.Shape
org.jsfml.graphics.CircleShape
com.rubynaxela.kyanite.game.entities.Particle
All Implemented Interfaces:
AnimatedEntity, MovingEntity, Drawable, Transformable
public class Particle extends CircleShape implements AnimatedEntity, MovingEntity
Represents a temporary object displaying a sequence of textures during its lifetime.

  • Constructor Details

    • Particle

      public Particle(@NotNull @NotNull Scene scene, @NotNull @NotNull Texture[] frames, float lifetime, @NotNull @NotNull Vector2f velocity)
      Constructs a Particle with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      scene - the scene this particle belongs to
      frames - the sequence of textures to be displayed (duration of a single frame is lifetime / frames.length)
      lifetime - the duration of this Particle's lifetime (in seconds)
      velocity - the velocity at which this Particle moves

    • Particle

      public Particle(@NotNull @NotNull Scene scene, @NotNull @NotNull Texture[] frames, float lifetime)
      Constructs a non-moving Particle with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      scene - the scene this particle belongs to
      frames - the sequence of textures to be displayed (duration of a single frame is lifetime / frames.length)
      lifetime - the duration of this Particle's lifetime

    • animate

      public void animate(@NotNull @NotNull Time deltaTime, @NotNull @NotNull Time elapsedTime)
      Description copied from interface: AnimatedEntity
      This method is called every window frame. It is designed to be used for defining the entity animated behavior.
      Specified by:
      animate in interface AnimatedEntity
      Parameters:
      deltaTime - the time that has passed between the previous and the current frame
      elapsedTime - the time that has passed since you the game was started
